# Inspired Aim (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Language-Dependent Spells|language-dependent]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Bard Spells|Bard 4]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[Fey (Domain)|Fey 3]], [[3rd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components**: V

**Range:** 40 ft.

**Targets:** Allies with 40-ft.-radius emanation centered on you

**Duration:** Concentration

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 101

You inspire allies within the spellâ€™s area to focus their minds on hitting their intended targets. All affected allies gain a +2 insight bonus on all ranged attacks.
